variants.p: When developing the amendments, the IASB observed that paragraph 94 sets out requirements for the accounting for changes in employee or third-party contributions. The IASB noted that the requirements in that paragraph apply to contributions that are attributed to periods of service using the same attribution method that is required by paragraph 70 for the gross benefit. Consequently, the IASB decided to amend paragraph 94 to clarify the scope of the requirements in that paragraph.
